message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by you. I understand the importance of this investment for you and would like to extend a special offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $10,000. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality solutions accessible while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe this is a compelling opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
